gobblin.writer

Class RetryWriter<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.RetryWriter<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataWriter<D>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class RetryWriter<D>
extends Object
implements DataWriter<D>
    Retry writer follows decorator pattern that retries on inner writer's failure.
